item.title: Rio on K3s on a pi4
item.description: Say What? Rio is a MicroPaaS for Kubernetes from Rancher. A not complete list of things Rio provides: Automatic DNS Load Balancing Routing We're going to be running it on a Raspberry Pi4, with Kubernetes coming from K3s, another Rancher project. Installation A few assumptions: You have a working Raspberry Pi 4 A public IP and some way of routing traffic to your Pi. Update your system:
